name: UIManagedDocument
desc: A managed document object that integrates with Core Data.

items.name: func configurePersistentStoreCoordinator(for: URL, ofType: String, modelConfiguration: String?, storeOptions: [AnyHashable : Any]?)
items.desc: Creates or loads the document’s persistent store.

items.name: var persistentStoreOptions: [AnyHashable : Any]?
items.desc: Options used when creating the document’s persistent store.

items.name: var modelConfiguration: String?
items.desc: A model configuration name to be passed when configuring the persistent store.

items.name: func persistentStoreType(forFileType: String) -> String
items.desc: Returns the Core Data store type for a given document file type.

items.name: func readAdditionalContent(from: URL)
items.desc: Handles reading non-Core Data content in the additional content directory in the document’s file package.

items.name: func additionalContent(for: URL) -> Any
items.desc: Handles writing non-Core Data content to the additional content directory in the document’s file package.

items.name: func writeAdditionalContent(Any, to: URL, originalContentsURL: URL?)
items.desc: Handles writing non-Core Data content to the document’s file package.

items.name: class var persistentStoreName: String
items.desc: Returns the name for the persistent store file inside the document’s file package.
